answers.author: Jeffrey Naftal
answers.text:
We don't use it in my current position but most of the cities I have worked for have used HTE/Sungard which has a fully integrated application suite of financials, utilities, community development, public safety, etc.  My experience with them has been really good since the first time I purchased their product in 1989.

author: Nick Woolery
text: What integrated information system does your city use?  Is it fully-integrated?  Please rate the performance of your system from 1-10, with 10 being very high performing.
title: Integrated Information System
